doc:
Thomas Holding https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Holding 0 Thomas J. Holding (25 January 1880 – 4 May 1929) was a British-born stage and film actor. He was popular in silent films during the World War I years. His first films were in several features starring the actress Pauline Frederick. He possibly had an extensive stage career in his native Britain before arriving in the United States. Holding died in 1929 of a heart attack in his dressing room while acting on Broadway according to Variety of 8 May 1929. Thomas_J._Holding ( 25_January_1880 – 4_May_1929 ) was a_British-born_stage_and_film_actor . He was_popular in silent_films during the_World_War_I_years .
